job.title: Software Engineer - Entry Level (Remote)
job.description: pAs a Software Engineer you are responsible for delivering highly scalable distributed multitenant enterprise class software solutions This includes responsibility for the entire application lifecycle from research and design to technical support of the products once deployedbrbrppnbspbrbrppThis includes being given complicated problems and being asked to find solutionsnbsp It includes all aspects of the software development lifecycle and involves working within an agile software development teamnbsp It requires adherence to company standards for quality compliance architecture and software development best practicesnbspbrbrppnbspbrbrppA symplr Software Engineer will work with their team and others around the globe to help create the best possible outcomes for our customersbrbrppnbspbrbrppstrongDuties and ResponsibilitiesbrbrstrongpulliDesign code test amp maintain enterprise software solutionsliliAdhere to and help others adhere to symplrrsquos coding quality and architectural standards guidelinesliliWork productively in an agile SDLC environment assisting the team and supporting group goalsliliDemonstrates clear solution thinking amp adherence to quality by creating code comments documentation diagrams and maintainable testable codeliliWork closely with Architects Quality Engineers and Product ManagementliliDetermines operational feasibility by evaluating analysis problem definition requirements solution development and proposed solutionsliliCommunicate in a professional manner when interacting with coworkers and customersliliParticipate in internal and external technical reviews as requiredliulpnbspbrbrppnbspbrbrppstrongSkills RequiredbrbrstrongpulliExcellent time management resource organization and priority establishment skills and ability to multitask in a fastpaced environmentliliAbility to work independently and as part of a teamliliRobust understanding of SOLID design principalsliliCan work quickly and efficiently with minimal supervisionliliExperience working in multiple programming languages like C Java TypeScript CSS etc with the desire and ability to learn moreliliHave a basic knowledge or understanding of the followingulliSOLID design principalsliliObjectOriented designliliREST Web servicesliliAgile Scrum methodologiesliulliliExperience with front end frameworks like Angular ReactliulpnbspbrbrppstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongpulliHave HEART To work here you must beulliHumble  selfaware and respectfulliliEffective  measurably move the needle amp immeasurably add valueliliAdaptable  innately curious and constantly changingliliRemarkable  stand out in some wayliliTransparent  openly and honestly sharing knowledgeliulliliLegal authorization to work in the US is requiredliliBachelorrsquos Degree in Computer Science or in STEM Majors Science Technology Engineering and Math is preferredlili1 years of proven working experience in software engineeringliulpnbspbrbrppstrongThe above job description is not intended to be an allinclusive list of duties and standards of the position Incumbents will follow any other instructions and perform
